Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the expertise put into its creation. Considering its unmatched value and capabilities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you like to make this remarkable product yours for $10000? This is a special opportunity to own a piece that not only stands out in terms of functionality but also adds a touch of prestige to your collection. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
